description: This file is a shell script used for network configuration and management tasks related to Wi-Fi interfaces, bridge setups, and system services. It includes functions to restart hostapd, configure Wi-Fi SSID visibility, manage IP addresses, adjust web server configurations, and synchronize network bridging and NAT rules.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd process by stopping and starting Wi-Fi interfaces.
